channel.title: Working with GridWeb Client Side Script on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Working with GridWeb Client Side Script on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Write GridWeb Client Side Script
item.description: Developers can write client-side scripts for the Aspose.Cells.GridWeb control. This means that it is possible to invoke a JavaScript function client-side to perform a specific task related to the GridWeb control. For example, developers can write JavaScript functions to submit GridWeb data to a server or show an alert message when a validation error occurs etc. This topic explains this feature with the help of examples. Contents Summary

item.title: Using OnAjaxCallFinishedClientFunction of GridWeb
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Possible Usage Scenarios 2 Using OnAjaxCallFinishedClientFunction of GridWeb 3 Google Chrome Console Output 4 FireFox Console Output 5 Sample Code | Possible Usage Scenarios OnAjaxCallFinishedClientFunction is a client side function which is called when user copies some data to GridWeb worksheet. This function is helpful when bulk of cells are updated and you want to keep the track of those updated cells at client side (i.

item.title: Read the values of the GridWeb cells on Client Side
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Possible Usage Scenarios 2 Read the values of the GridWeb cells on Client Side 3 Screenshot 4 Sample Code 5 Console Output || Possible Usage Scenarios You can read the values of GridWeb cells on client side script using the gridwebinstance.getCellsArray() method. Once, you will call it, it will return the array of all the cells in active worksheet.

item.title: Resize GridWeb in the browser window
item.description: Contents Summary 1 Possible Usage Scenarios 2 Using GridWeb’s resize method 2.1 Sample Code 3 Making GridWeb resizable using resizable jquery ui feature 3.1 Sample Code | Possible Usage Scenarios Sometimes you want Aspose.Cells.GridWeb should resize itself in accordance with browser window. You might need GridWeb should always adjust its size (height, width) and compatible with browser window’s size.
